name: kuttl-v0.14.0
body:
## Breaking Change

- The default name for the kuttl report has changed.  The change is from `kuttl-test.xml` to `kuttl-report.xml` (or json).  The name is now renamable.  To get previous behavior use the flag `--report-name=kuttl-test`


## Changelog

- refactor: use t.Cleanup instead of defer (#402)
- Refactor Report Name function (#404)
- Allow user to set reportName (#395)
- fix: step cleanup not capturing current step (#401)
- Add support for linux arm64 for krew-index (#392)

## Contributors

@benjaminjb, @eddycharly, @imusmanmalik and @kensipe

name: kuttl-v0.13.1
body:
## Changelog
* dd99d46 Add support for linux arm64 for krew-index (#392)
* 8a65c1c fix: step cleanup not capturing current step (#401)

name: kuttl-v0.13.0
body:
## Changes

- Bump some dependencies ([#384](https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/384))
- golangci-lint bump to 1.49.0 along with required resolutions ([#382](https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/382))
- Fix lint execution ([#381](https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/381))
- Add CRDs reflecting KUTTL configuration files to provide coding assistance in IDEs ([#376](https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/384))
- Improve error message for test assertions ([#380](https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/384))
- Upgrade multiple dependencies ([#375](https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/384))

## Fixes

- https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/issues/386 is fixed which unblocked client side throttling as reported.  The fixed as a client-go dependency upgrade which was resolved with ([#384](https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/384))

## Contributors

@gberche-orange, @iblancasa, @kensipe and @porridge

## What's Changed
* Upgrade multiple dependencies by @iblancasa in https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/375
* Improve error message for test assertions by @porridge in https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/380
* Add CRDs reflecting kuttl configuration files to provide coding assistance in IDEs by @gberche-orange in https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/376
* Fix lint execution by @iblancasa in https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/381
* golangci-lint bump to 1.49.0 along with required resolutions by @kensipe in https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/382
* Bump some dependencies by @iblancasa in https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/384

## New Contributors
* @gberche-orange made their first contribution in https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/pull/376

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/compare/v0.12.1...v0.13.0

name: kuttl-v0.12.1
body:
v0.12.0 was released with a bug around reporting.  This release is to fix that issue.
Please see https://github.com/kudobuilder/kuttl/releases/tag/v0.12.0 for 0.12.x release notes

## Changes

- Test Report Dir Bug Fix (#364)

## Contributors

@kensipe

name: kuttl-v0.12.0
body:
## Changes

- Enable receiving a rest config on TestSuite (#360)
- Fix Report Failure on Skip Delete (#357)
- Revert "Enable receiving a rest config on TestSuite" (#359)
- Move to Go 1.18 (#354)
- KinD dependency version bump (#351)
- Bump cobra and testify depends, re-adding tests with necessary changes (#339)
- Create a folder when it doesn't exist and is needed for the report (#326)
- KEP-7 Implmented (#319)
- Do not hide YAML parsing errors. (#324)
- Correct --config help string. (#320)

## Contributors

@alifelan, @haoxins, @iblancasa, @kensipe and @porridge

name: kuttl-v0.11.1
body:
## Changelog

This release fixes a security concern and fixes a crashing bug on Linux platforms using KinD

- Bump kind to v0.11.1 fixes https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/kind/issues/2240 (#313)
- fix to containerd security report https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c72p-9xmj-rx3w (#312)
- Adding Darwin M1 Chip Support to Krew (#310)

## Contributors

@croomes and @kensipe

name: kuttl-v0.11.0
body:
## New Features

* Darwin M1 Chip Support
* Improved Kubernetes Events Logging
* Improved kubeconfig path resolution

## Changes

- Adding log message for error caught by linter (#309)
- Try fetching v1  or corev1 events if v1beta1 events are not available. #299 (#300)
- adding darwin m1 chip to releases (#305)
- Bump golangci-lint to 1.41.1 (#306)
- fix: handle kubeconfig path resolution in steps properly (#303)
- Update of Reviewers for Code Owners (#307)

## Contributors

@kensipe, @porridge and @takirala

name: kuttl-v0.10.0
body:
## Changes

- Support multiple Kubernetes clusters by supporting kubeconfig in test steps - Follow up for #266 (#291)
- Flush command log always (#289)
- bumping linter to 1.38.0 (#283)
- changes to the 1.16 testing libraries (#282)
- Add tar and gzip to the image. (#281)

## Contributors

@alenkacz, @chhsia0, @kensipe and @takirala

name: kuttl-v0.8.1
body:
Patch-Release to support go16

## Changelog

b6e92c1 Enable ability to compile against 1.16 testing libraries (#282) (#286)

name: kuttl-v0.4.0
body:
## 🚀 Highlights

- teststep apply, assert and errors can now take urls, files or folder (#123)
- Switch to kuttl.dev/v1beta.  Deprecated support for kudo.dev (#119)
- Command Scripts from TestSuite or TestStep (#117)
- Commands can Opt-out of Logging (#116)

@jbarrick-mesosphere and @kensipe

name: kuttl-v0.1.0
body:
## 🚀 Highlights

- Initial Release (Separate from KUDO)
- Supports 3 Test Control Planes (Mocked, KinD, Any Cluster via KUBECONFIG)
- Programmatic Integration as a library
- Solo Execution for E2E testing


## Changelog

6bd135e Add KEP process
52acc84 Add unit under test declaration KEP.
2106540 Adding Github workflows, contribution docs and security contacts (#30)
92f27fd Bump Dependencies (#25)
d28e406 Fixes Background Process Leaking Bug (#35)
4c55ec2 Goreleaser configuration (#31)
4c423c4 Merge pull request #1 from kudobuilder/ken/proj-init
449e1e8 Merge pull request #17 from kudobuilder/ken/cli
21e22f2 Merge pull request #18 from kudobuilder/ken/kep3-cleanup
f97f9f7 Merge pull request #2 from kudobuilder/keps
dd3bc08 Merge pull request #3 from kudobuilder/unit-under-test-kep
a9be3d5 Release Process and krew generation scripts (#32)
889c2a9 Removing Kubectl command for now (#36)
38c1108 Separating Run() method into Setup() and RunTests() allowing for programmatic access between setup and tests
13c66eb Support Background Processes
cfdd2ab Testing Infra AND Circle CI Integration (#29)
787b539 added background commands
cc2d86a adding in CLI for kuttl
18f637a adding tests and better command run exit error handlign
72ffae1 cli for kuttl
a03c0f1 fixing linter errors (#28)
b7c0516 kep cleanup.  Removal of KUDO from main KEP.  Numbering KEP-3 and cleaning up TOC
043d4b1 remove StartKUDO reference (#22)
389f30b remove kudo from kuttl
c2c6fe4 update to kudo authors
8d73343 updates based on PR feedback

## Contributors

@gerred, @jbarrick-mesosphere, @jmccormick2001 and @kensipe
